raw_body: FERNANDO – CLAUDIA ROSEMARY,​ daughter of late Michael and Mildred Fernando of Maggona,​ sister of late Viyani,​ late Lyn,​ late Joyce and late Blaise,​ sister-in-law of Manel,​ late Noeline,​ late Bert and of Pearl (Canada). Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour on Tuesday,​ 9th April from 10.00 a.m. onwards. A Funeral Service will take place at the Parlour on the same day at 3.00 p.m. followed by Burial at the General Cemetery,​ Borella.024672
